title: Sampler, 1804
medium:
Medium: silk, linen  
Technique: cross stitch embroidery on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Anna Maria Blagg her Work in the 13th year of her Age AD 1804
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Finely worked in colored silks on bolting cloth.  Three sections with flower urn, insects and animals, Adam and Eve, verses, running vine border.
